What are the treatments for mitochondrial complex III deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of mitochondrial complex III deficiency:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Mitochondrial Disorders Overview  - Genetic Testing Registry: MITOCHONDRIAL COMPLEX III DEFICIENCY, NUCLEAR TYPE 6  - Genetic Testing
